reset.title: Reset and restart?
reset.body: Do you want to re-shuffle the deck and restart the game?
reset.error: Error while restarting game, restart the application

privacy.body:
The app doesn't collect nor access any type of user's related data.

I mean it really just shows a list of words for you to sing.

That's it, have a good day.
privacy.title: Privacy policy

credits.body: A huge thanks to Moutonus and Machiavel for helping me with graphic assets and the wordlist
